alert.note: Alert for Nelson (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 24 at 8:16PM EDT until July 24 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1115 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of NORTH CENTRAL and SOUTH CENTRAL Kentucky, including the following counties, in NORTH CENTRAL Kentucky, Hardin, Larue and Nelson. In SOUTH CENTRAL Kentucky, Marion. * WHEN...Until 1115 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 816 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1.5 and 2.5 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Elizabethtown, Hodgenville, Radcliff, New Haven, Roanoke, Lyons, Nelsonville, Athertonville, Younger Creek and Leafdale. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
